|tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=MyWLAN |default_ssid_regex=^MyWLAN$ |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:02:72 |oui_eth=00:02:72 |default_ch= }} See [http://www.bcwireless.net/moin.cgi/GigaFast_WF719-CAPR here] for considerably more information (boot log, UART pinout, list of alternative firmwares, more pictures, etc).

Barrel plug measurements are approximate.
